name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ronnell Jay BURRELL, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ronnell Jay BURRELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted. 285 Pa.Super. 602, 427 A.2d 1208.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Alden, James M. Pierce, Wayne, for appellant.
David E. Fritchey, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
